text: Yalgogrin South is an unbounded rural locality within the locality of Ardlethan in the central north part of the Riverina. It is situated, by road, about 21 km north of Kamarah and 26 km north of Ardlethan. The name Yalgogrin is derived from the local Aboriginal word for dead box tree. The village of Yalgogrin formerly named Yalgogrin North which lies outside the Riverina area is about 40 km north of Yalgogrin South, past the village of Tallimba. ==Notes and references== Category:Towns in the Riverina Category:Coolamon Shire
title: Yalgogrin South, New South Wales
